articles.description: “Can they keep African-American superstars there?” said pundit Chris Broussard, over Toronto Raptors trade rumours, raising eyebrows on this side of the border.
articles.content:

articles.title: WNBA star Brittney Griner sends letter to President Biden pleading for his help - CBC Sports
articles.description: Brittney Griner has made an appeal to President Joe Biden in a letter passed to the White House through her representatives saying she feared she might never return home and asking that he not "forget about me and the other American Detainees."
